name: Spring Baby Ninja Panda - Stick Jumpy Hero
name_original: Spring Baby Ninja Panda - Stick Jumpy Hero
description:
Dive in to the most addictive game you'll play today. Spring Baby Ninja Panda - Stick Jumpy Hero is fun and extremely compelling.
Tap to jump from one platform to another as fast as you can!

This Panda baby is simply lazy to move on but you need to force him to jump and move one!
So now jump like a cat and prove yourself to be the fun maker in this amazing Panda Jump gameplay

How to play
• Tap to jump
• Tap longer to jump farther
